Package edu.cmu.sphinx.frontend.filter

Provides classes that implement frequency filters

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Dither
    Implements a dither for the incoming packet.
    EnergyFilter
    Another way to deal with zero energy frames.
    Preemphasizer
    Implements a high-pass filter that compensates for attenuation in the audio data.

Package edu.cmu.sphinx.frontend.filter Description

Provides classes that implement frequency filters.
